#eye #alltanks #all_tanks #big #middle #little #anime
Eye?

Прицельная сетка с Ворошиловым из Azure Lane, на скрине приближение 3х

Думал сделать совсем другой прицелл но вчера пришёл заказ от @SHISHIRO_SAN Thank you for your order!
Впервые вообще делаю прицелл с персом из азурки но мне понравилось

Так же вы можете писать мне в лс для заказа прицела type_alpha1 работаем мы на пару так что скорее всего заказ выполним быстро

Так же у меня есть свой полк, название - Sora no Otoshimono

#alltanks #azur_lane #anime #voroshilov

#dumer #alltanks #all_tanks
Thinking?

Прицельная сетка с Мари из Blue Archive, на скрине приближение 6х

Новая работа на этот раз с Мари и да я не помер, в скором времени выложу ещё пару прицелов а потом походу так же откисну на хз сколько

Так же вы можете писать мне в лс для заказа прицела type_alpha1 работаем мы на пару так что скорее всего заказ выполним быстро

Так же у меня есть свой полк, название - Sora no Otoshimono

当前版本：2.41.0.13这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

Current version: 2.41.0.13 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.com...

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

RP-3 and Uncle Tom sight for the British Firebrand TF Mk IV.

For RP-3's make sure speed is above 420kmh when launching. When speed exceeds 500kmh, use the higher part of the sight. If you are closer to 300m, use the small side portions. Dive angle works from about 15 degrees up to 50 degrees/

For Uncle Toms ABSOLUTE...

Update 4-25-25: Added AoA sighting and adjusted marks for better accuracy on Brigand

RP-3 and gun sights for the Brigand B 1 and Beaufighter family. Yes, the 40mm Beaufighter is included.

For the Beaufighter dive angle should be about 30 degrees. IAS should be at or above 380kmh. Speeds closer to or above 500kmh should use the small reticles under the main gun reticle.

As request, here is a sight with Iochi Mari. This picture was not the one I intended to use, but I had a issue with the number of line to make it. I will try to fix it, and if someone knows of to increase the max number of line on a sight, pls tell me. The pack countain 3 size of sight, depending of the tank zoom.

TO USE A7M2 ROCKETS ensure that speed is above 350kmh (above 550kmh for the top guide)...

RP-3 and gun sight for the Firefly series (I, IV, and V) for Brits and France. Intended dive angle for rockets is 20-40 degrees. Keep in mind that the Firefly's airframe will begin to lift above the target you are aiming at fairly early,...

Lying 2B right in your sight, the eye will not get enough. the original picture is inside a .zip, with a file for wt-draw
(I've been drawing lips for a very long time, so don't hit me :) )

Anime.

#tanks #KV7 #groundrb #sim #ussr #simulator #russia #KV

Sights for the KV-7 (US-13)! Comes with RB and Sim versions.

UPDATE: Added a new reticle with ranging for APHE (BR-350B) main gun and APBC (BR-240SP) side guns for RB.

The bottom of each V is a range for the 76.2mm main gun, and the tips of each V are the two 45mm guns.

To install, extract UserSights.7z into your main WarThunder directory.

Next, in-game, go to Options > Ground Vehicle Battle Settings > Sight Settings

On the top left of the Sight Settings menu, make sure you have the KV-7 (US-13) selected....
